title: Little Complications
description: Danny had never found his place in the world. “Normal” is a word that has never applied. After a traumatic childhood University offers him an opportunity to break away from his small town and find a place where he fit. Rhys had always known what he wanted. He wanted to meet a nice normal guy. Have a nice normal life. Someone who would be the perfect compliment to his high-powered lawyer career. Some with the same interests, the same career path. But on the eve of breaking up with that perfect guy, he meets a blue haired artist who is everything he doesn’t know he wants.Maybe together they can figure out that “normal” is highly over-rated.
author: Lili Frey
